content: this simple baby cardigan is knit from the top down and is completely seamless the neck line is a v neck which makes this a great cardigan for either a boy or girl the neck band is picked up after knitting the body and sleeves along the front edges and neckline for the neckband/button hole band sleeves are knit in the round instructions are based on the magic loop method using long 100cm circular needles but you can use two circular needles or double ended needles this pattern would be great for self patterning yarn as well
